website_summaries.verdict: A basic seat with decent padding and arm rests.
pros: Seats and cushions are fairly comfortable
A good value at the price
A nice replacement for a pontoon boat captain's chair
cons: Larger people might find this seat uncomfortable because of the molded arms
Not as sturdy as some others

customer_reviews.title: Moeller heavy durty standard boat helm seat - with lousy mounting system
customer_reviews.text: I bought three, installed them on pontoon boat. First time out, all three seats departed their mounting base due to what has to be a joke of the staple-like things on bottom of seat which pulled out, letting seat fall to the deck. I'm having to reverse engineer them and put in proper hardware. Seats and cushions look good and were comfortable until they fell of their pedestals. Can't believe folks have actually rated them more than 2 stars. Maybe they were properly made in the past.... watch out for these today.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Seat is a bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Seat is well made, and a great value for the money....but a bit on the smaller side. The mounting base is nice. The predrilled holes were not meant for our base. 2 stainless tee nuts and a drill bit made it easy to modify for our boat. The back support is great. The quality is very good for the price. Just beware that it is a little tight. I am a taller guy, with a 36 inch waist. I can fit, but the sides are tight on the hips.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This seat fit perfectly in place on my existing pedestal. It’s sturdy plastic and the pads snap into place. Pads are thin, but I don’t ride for hours at a time, so it’s good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Darkstar

customer_reviews.title: Don't be put off by reviews seat very nice seat for the money I am a large man and fit very well
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews to these seats and was put off a little bit I'm here to say it's as good as any other seat out there it does have sharp edges but if you're that worried about it get a this seat is very clean and nice I cannot say anything about durability as if I just purchased the seat and mounted it the screw set was a little short but it reached is very nice seat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great package!  Could be improved upon.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good feels good. Easy to install. Could have a more durable base mounting system but that can always be added if need be. It’s probably more suited to a lake boat, here in Hawaii we have some rough seas and need to have things built extra sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Supagruv

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The chair is cheap, easy to install, and comfortable! A great purchase for about a year. The chair part is in great shape but however the cushions have not held their integrity. They have not torn, but the cheap material has somehow absorbed die from bathing suits I cant bleach out. I now have to order new cushions. Problem, new cushions will cost the same as these chairs... Do I order the same cheap chairs or do I step it up and get some nicer ones?
customer_reviews.author: Whit Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product for this price. Can’t beat it DELIVERED TO YOUR DOOR IN A JIFFY!!
customer_reviews.author: frit

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control, maybe worth a try for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Non HD model or the like must be a real POS. First impression, cheap. A few minor black stains on new product. Used it for 60 days, not impressed but barely satisfied. Removable cushions are nice. Had to remove some plastic from one hole to mount this and purchase additional hardware. Existing hardware and depth of holes suck!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Pyon

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat for bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: Best product I could find for the money. They only have white which is OK but would prefer to have other color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Easy to install and durable. I had read reviews for this item and there were one or two negative ones with respect to installation. Looking back on my installation effort, I would have to say the negative reviews had to do with not following the instructions. Very satisfied with ease of installation and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Its a great chair for the money ... could have a bit bigger seat
customer_reviews.author: LRI

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two of them and they are really not that sturdy but for the price they will do
customer_reviews.text: These seats are just ok. I ordered two of them and they are really not that sturdy but for the price they will do. One of them already has a crack in the back of the seat and a button has came off.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Justus

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Good price, fast ship. Not nearly as heavy duty as it looks in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why the heck would anyone recover their seats when you can buy NEW seats for less!
customer_reviews.text: I got a quote to recover my existing seats of $150/each seat. I bought these seats BRAND NEW with cushions for less than that... pretty hard to go wrong. They aren't exactly a Stidd chair, but I'm not a little guy and they fit me fine and have held up well so far!
customer_reviews.author: LNSJR

customer_reviews.title: This product looks nice, which is why I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: This product looks nice, which is why I purchased it. However, when you install it on to your mounting pedestal, you use bolts that screw into the built-in hardware "nuts". These just pulled right out. Now I will have to do major retrofitting to fix.
customer_reviews.author: TEROX

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: The chair is decent but, the mounting plate is garbage. Made of plastic and the threads came out of the plate even my 6 yr old sat on the chair. Waste of time and money. Garbage chair don't name the same mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: boat chair
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE CHAIR FOR BOAT COMFORTABLE AND NICE BACK SUPPORT THE MGF. need's to correct the mounting plate...it does not line with the base plate so you have to have someone re-drill all the mounting holes and BUY STAINLESS BOLT"S TO MOUNT IT THEY ARE NOT INCLUDED
customer_reviews.author: dovie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SEAT SET !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat and cushion set for the price. I was just looking for replaceing my boats old seat cushions . It was cheaper to get this seat with a set of cushions . Great quilty of the plastic seat and cushions to. Plus the molded in blind nuts made it real easy to reinstall the seat onto my petistall. Cant go wrong for the price . Highly recommended....
customer_reviews.author: joe minchelli

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My old chair finely died. This chair was a, relatively, easy replacement. Very comfortable and works good. It is a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander F. Krieger

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This seat arrived as expect by the seller. It's very sturdy, made from good quality. It's comfortable, and fits on my pontoon boat very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Thatonegirl

customer_reviews.title: The seat frame is well made and easily installed. The cushions are relatively cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The seat frame is well made and easily installed. The cushions are relatively cheap and flimsy. They are molded and are pretty thin. All in all it was worth the money spent but I will try and find a higher grade of seat cushion replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good seat horrible mounting hardware
customer_reviews.text: Solid seat but the mounting hardware is junk. First The universal adapter plate that attaches the seat to the pedestal does not line up. Second the "hammered in" nuts that hold the pedestal to seat come out as soon as you sit on it. I bought another similar seat and it is exactly the same. I am blown away they would put this nice seat on the market with this horrible mounting plate and hardware. I was creative and rigged both seats so they work fine. If you are not a person that is handy, buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn DiEsposti

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these to replace the lounge seats in my 1994 Bayliner 1850LS. I really like the seats and they've held up well over the last 2 years. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Seat
customer_reviews.text: Nice seat the whole thing is made of plastic and the cushions are removable and replaceable. It sits lower than my previous seat but I plan to add a treated wood block to raise it up a couple of inches.
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Callegari

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Good product
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping arrived in brand new condition for a big box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boat seats
customer_reviews.text: It came in perfect condition and fit great. I recommend these boat seats to anyone that is looking for new boat seats.
customer_reviews.author: Juan mato

customer_reviews.title: (Baahanas Boy)  Yeahh Amzon!!!!
customer_reviews.text: (Bahamas Boy) Got it installed. Friends don't believe the quick time it got here. Their jealous too.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Russell

customer_reviews.title: Hardware failed, feamale thread stripped out of mounting plate.
customer_reviews.text: Mounting threads failed, manufacturing fail. Happened under very little stress. Return/ exchange options not provided either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my dad whom can find a way to destroy anything.....They have held up perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Should last a long time. These seats replaced the rotted plywood covered with fiberglass seats
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Chair
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a replacement seat for captain's chair for our pontoon boat. It was a little smaller than the original chair, but worked fine. Great chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RNMOM

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: It was a good price for the seats with the cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Forlenza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, well made seat. Fit well in a Bayliner 175
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: love them.
customer_reviews.text: very , very comfy . Bought 2 of them . love them .
customer_reviews.author: taper002

customer_reviews.title: many confortable hours in the boat
customer_reviews.text: does the job and looks good doing it. Could be a bit wider. I added it to a bench seat in my pota-boat and it works great
customer_reviews.author: photog

customer_reviews.title: Boat Helm Seats
customer_reviews.text: I don't really see anything "heavy duty" about them but for the money they are great and well functioning seats...would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bob Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe at any  price
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money as it is very cheaply built. I believe this is a hazard that should not be used on any boat. For the basic seat this one is a real dud. It fell apart as my young 7 year old played around with it in the house. If this had been installed on my boat and fell apart while in use I would have been sued for operating an unsafe vessel and rightly so. What bothers me the most is that the mounting plate came apart in the hardware just sitting on the mounting pedestal on a 65 pound child, what is it was a 220 pound man? Scary business!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Fiola

customer_reviews.title: ... one so I know what I was buying its great
customer_reviews.text: Buddy has one so I know what I was buying its great
customer_reviews.author: sScott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The seat is great quality - 100% better than the seats in our boat
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Goff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice captains chair. Works great however its a tad small.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Losey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This seats worked out great as replacements for our pontoon!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Really a nice seat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice seat for the price. I bought it because it cost far less than having my old captains seat recovered.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Collins White

customer_reviews.title: Boat Helm Seat
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit well -- seat met expectations -- good quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: BOBBY

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes I think it works really good for our boat
customer_reviews.author: Joe Branton

customer_reviews.title: Nice seats for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice seats for the money. Installed in our Sea Ray 210 Cuddy Cabin with just 2 additional hole in the mounting plate. Pressed out the nut plates and pressed into new holes. The seats work great!
customer_reviews.author: Hal Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair for the money, but It sits lower than original chair so the pedestal should be replaced at same time.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and perfect fit. Can't wait to get out to try it on for size!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Plank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect just used it Sunday 70 mile trip was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: erica dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully my old screws worked best. Those metal pieces to screw the screws into ...
customer_reviews.text: There was a lack of base plate/seat mounting instructions and some plate & seat mounting holes did not line up exactly. Thankfully my old screws worked best. Those metal pieces to screw the screws into stripped out of their places and were not able to be reinserted so therefore were not able to be used. We made it work and that is the most important thing. Do like the fact you can take the vinyl pieces off and reinstall when used.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Jones

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I'm happy with product. My old seat was trashed in just a few yrs. this one will last much longer due to removable back an seat
customer_reviews.author: Ernest F. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO INSTALL. ALSO LIKE THE FACT THAT THE CUSHIONS ARE REMOVABLE FOR CLEANING AND STORAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Orr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, and the cushions are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, and the cushions are comfortable. For the price you can't beat the quality. Can't wait to install these on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: mark beach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: On time and nice seat. I like the pads being replaceable
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with price and quality. It is comfortable and exactly as we expected.
customer_reviews.author: lovzboat

customer_reviews.title: small and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'll start off by saying it seems as if it will last for a long time and is strong in design. However, due to its very low size I kept meaning to return it but never got around to it. I'm an average size guy and the back of the seat doesn't reach halfway up my back so keep that in mind if you're ordering it for a ski boat where you want back support. For the price there's probably not anything better out there I just recommend spending more and getting something a little more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Chad V.

customer_reviews.title: THIS SEAT LOOKED GREAT
customer_reviews.text: The seat looked just like it did in your ad and we needed to replace the seat on our pontoon before selling it. The product arrived on time as described in the advertisement so my husband and I were pleased. The fabric and cushioning of the seat were plush and soft. This our first purchase from AMAZON and it was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Doll

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good but I had to modify brscket to fit my pedistal..
customer_reviews.author: john roiy

customer_reviews.title: You have to be kidding me!
customer_reviews.text: After installing this product, I sat in seat and lean to reach something and the inserts into the seat popped out. Not happy with this product at all. Do not understand how someone could sell this product, also only came with 4 bolts, I had to shop for additional stainless steel bolts.
customer_reviews.author: The Maritimer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller and not as comfortable as the captain's chair we replaced
customer_reviews.text: Smaller and not as comfortable as the captain's chair we replaced, but for the price we're happy with it. This seems much sturdier than some other brands of seats we've purchased for fishing seats in the front of our deck boat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair but cheap snaps.
customer_reviews.text: Chair as expected but snaps on cushion popped off after 1st removal. And its too bulky to return. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: its a good fit and looks good. comfortable for a 150lb up to 250lb man. receved it in good shape and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Paco

customer_reviews.title: Boat seats
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last year for our fishing boat. They are well made and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schrock

customer_reviews.title: Moeller Heavy duty boat helm seat
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped quickly and I am very satisfied with the product. I would recommend this product to anyone that is looking for an inexpensive quality seat
customer_reviews.author: matthew young

customer_reviews.title: I ordered one chair with cushions and another set of ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one chair with cushions and another set of cushions, but instead I got two chairs and was charged for them. jerry talton
customer_reviews.author: gerald talton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect size helm chair for a pontoon ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and perfect size helm chair for a pontoon boat. I bought it as a gift for my Dad because the old chair had worn out from years of use and sun damage. I would definitely recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: ryanoconnor98

product_meta.title: Moeller ST2000-HD, Boat Helm Seat and Cushion, Includes Mounting Plate
product_meta.description: When you’re out on the water having fun, you shouldn’t need to give your fuel system a second thought. With Moeller, you don’t. Our products are safe, reliable, and durable. For more than 25 years, Moeller Marine has been the industry standard in fuel system design and construction. Moeller’s reputation is built on innovative engineering, quality construction, and award-winning service.
feature_bullets: 18.5 Inch Long x 17.5 Inch Wide x 13.5 Inch High

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
